activityStatus.description: Member activity status. Supported values: UNKNOWN, ACTIVE, MUTED. ACTIVE: Member can write forum posts and blog comments. MUTED: Member cannot write forum posts or blog comments. UNKNOWN: Insufficient permissions to get the status.

contact.description: Corresponds 1:1 to the 'info' property on a contact object

addressLine.description: Main address line, usually street and number, as free text.

addressLine2.description: Free text providing more detailed address information, such as apartment, suite, or floor.

country.description: 2-letter country code in an ISO-3166 alpha-2 format.

countryFullname.description: This property isn't documented in the docs

formattedAddress.description: This property isn't documented in the docs

subdivision.description: Code for a subdivision (such as state, prefecture, or province) in an ISO 3166-2 format.

subdivisions.description: This property isn't documented in the docs

id.description: Street address ID. (Note: seems to be optional, not present in test data)

tag.description: Address type. Supported values: UNTAGGED, HOME, WORK, BILLING, SHIPPING. UNTAGGED is shown as "Other" in the Contact List.

birthdate.description: Birth date in YYYY-MM-DD format. For example, 2020-03-15.

primary.description: Indicates whether this is the contact's primary email address. When changing primary to true for an email, the contact's other emails become false.

tag.description: Email type. Supported values: UNTAGGED, MAIN, HOME, WORK. UNTAGGED is shown as "Other" in the Contact List

extendedFields.description: This property isn't documented as it's a general structure

jobTitle.description: Contact's job title. Corresponds to the Position field in the Dashboard.

labelKeys.description: This property isn't documented as it's a general structure

locale.description: Locale in IETF BCP 47 language tag format. Typically, this is a lowercase 2-letter language code, followed by a hyphen, followed by an uppercase 2-letter country code. For example, en-US for U.S. English, and de-DE for Germany German.

e164Phone.description: ITU E.164-formatted phone number. Automatically generated using phone and countryCode, as long as both of those values are valid.

primary.description: Whether this is the contact's primary phone number. When changing primary to true for a phone, the contact's other phones become false.

tag.description: Phone type. Supported values: UNTAGGED, MAIN, HOME, MOBILE, WORK, FAX. UNTAGGED is shown as "Other" in the Contact List.

image.description: Image. This can contain an image URL or a Wix Media image ID.

id.description: WixMedia image ID. This property is written by Wix when an image is uploaded to the Wix Media Manager.

url.description: Image source: Either a Media Manager URL or external URL.

urlExpirationDate.description: Image URL expiration date (when relevant). Optional

imageProvider.description: This property isn't documented in the docs

createdDate.description: Date and time when the member was created. ISO format.

lastLoginDate.description: Date and time when the member last logged in to the site. ISO format.

loginEmail.description: Email used by the member to log in to the site. Optional.

privacyStatus.description: Member privacy status. Supported values: UNKNOWN, PRIVATE, PUBLIC. PUBLIC: Member is visible to everyone. PRIVATE: Member is hidden from site visitors and other site members. Member is returned only to site contributors and apps with the appropriate permissions. UNKNOWN: Insufficient permissions to get the status.

cover.description: Member's cover photo, used as a background picture in members profile page. Cover positioning can be altered with cover.offsetX and cover.offsetY. When left empty, the values default to 0.

id.description: WixMedia image ID. This property is written by Wix when an image is uploaded to the Wix Media Manager.

url.description: Image source: Either a Media Manager URL or external URL.

nickname.description: Name that identifies the member to other members. Displayed on the member's profile page and interactions in the forum or blog.

id.description: WixMedia image ID. This property is written by Wix when an image is uploaded to the Wix Media Manager.

url.description: Image source: Either a Media Manager URL or external URL.

slug.description: Slug that determines the member's profile page URL.

title.description: Member title. Currently available through the API only.

status.description: Member site access status. Supported values: UNKNOWN, PENDING, APPROVED, BLOCKED, OFFLINE. PENDING: Member created and is waiting for approval by site owner. APPROVED: Member can log in to the site. OFFLINE: Member is a guest author for the site blog and cannot log in to the site. BLOCKED: Member is blocked and cannot log in to the site. UNKNOWN: Insufficient permissions to get the status.

updatedDate.description: Date and time when the member was updated. ISO format.
